text: Teuma tasaba beu that di gata Rasul mulia pih meunan ulah Lagee dum rasul nyang kong that ate Teuma keu kaphe bek that tagundah Bek rijang keu jih bala talakee Sit ka meuteuntee nyan hana ubah Watee jikalon peue nyang geujanji Sang bak jih meuri rijang sileupah Meusiat sagai jih nyoe di donya Bandum nyoe teuma raya phaedah Kawom nyang fased nyan nyang binasa Nyang laen teuma Tuhan peuleupah
